channel.title: Help with Fun Pk Zone (In Castle Wars)
channel.description:
How can I make it so when I attack a player in my Castle Wars and he die, he respawn in his base (Saradomin or Zamorak) and he don't lose stuff.
Thanks if you help me. A code or a part of code of this would be cool.

item.title: Help with Fun Pk Zone (In Castle Wars)
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Ok, I’ll try this but can you help me please ?

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Fun Pk Zone (In Castle Wars)

item.title: Help with Fun Pk Zone (In Castle Wars)
item.dc:creator: @_Joshua1 |Joshua|
item.description:
@_Joshua1 wrote:

Umm, I had no idea you wanted a full explanation on how to add the area… But you would want to declare an isin for this area then… Then make it so that the coords are in isInwilderness… Then you would have to add the isincastlewars or whatever your going to make it to the void that says if they die there they will keep items or adjust the youdied method.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Fun Pk Zone (In Castle Wars)

item.title: Help with Fun Pk Zone (In Castle Wars)
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote="|Joshua|, post:6, topic:297317"]You should be able to add this around the code that says like…

isInPitsGame()

something like this.[/quote]

Ok and when I’ll add it, I’ll be able to attack players in it ?

Read full topic

|Joshua|:

Dude, forget to take your meds? This is for 317’s don’t try to tell me that my own 317 code doesn’t work on 317’s.

item.title: Help with Fun Pk Zone (In Castle Wars)
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote="|Joshua|, post:2, topic:297317"]If (isInSaraCW() && (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514)) { toX = SARAZONEXCOORD; toY = SARAZONEYCOORD } else { toX = ZAMMYZONEXCOORD; toY = ZAMMYZONEYCOORD; }

Written from scratch and very quickly please post errors.[/quote]

This is for 508. I’m using DeltaScape base for 317.

This won’t work because it won’t be able to find symbol.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Fun Pk Zone (In Castle Wars)

item.title: Help with Fun Pk Zone (In Castle Wars)
item.dc:creator: @_Joshua1 |Joshua|
item.description:
@_Joshua1 wrote:

If (isInSaraCW() && (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514)) { toX = SARAZONEXCOORD; toY = SARAZONEYCOORD } else { toX = ZAMMYZONEXCOORD; toY = ZAMMYZONEYCOORD; }

Written from scratch and very quickly please post errors.

Read full topic
